channel.title: HOW DO I LET PEOPLE GET ONTO MY SOURCE USING .no-ip.biz.. Read here
channel.description:
I have a no-ip thing. Its called activepk.no-ip.biz...
Whats the connection between that and my server?
How do people get onto my no-ip?

item.title: HOW DO I LET PEOPLE GET ONTO MY SOURCE USING .no-ip.biz.. Read here
item.dc:creator: @CChhrriiss CChhrriiss
item.description:
@CChhrriiss wrote:

If your using a modem. you dont have to port foreward. Register with no-ip, turn your firewall off, compile and run your server. And your good to go

Read full topic

item.title: HOW DO I LET PEOPLE GET ONTO MY SOURCE USING .no-ip.biz.. Read here
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You need to port-foward, open up the port through your Firewall, and have a no-ip DUC Running.

Read full topic
